channel.title: Articles by Casper Baumbach on Yoga Terms
channel.description: Recent content in Articles by Casper Baumbach on Yoga Terms

item.title: From Novice to Yogi: The Ultimate Guide for Yoga Beginners
item.description: Let’s dive into the world of yoga, a practice that has stood the test of time, offering a slice of calm in our otherwise hectic lives.

item.title: What is Sari?
item.description: Hey there! I’m so excited to talk to you about Sari, one of my favorite yoga practices!

item.title: What is Prasad?
item.description: Prasad refers to the food offerings made to a deity as part of Hindu worship.

item.title: What is Egoism?
item.description: Egoism, in yoga philosophy, refers to the identification of the self with the ego, or the false sense of self.

item.title: What is Baba Nam Kevalam?
item.description: Baba Nam Kevalam (Sanskrit: बाबा नाम केवलम) is a mantra that is often used in the practice of yoga and meditation.
